title: september 2: london on fire
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the Great Fire of London in 1666 and some unexpectedly eerie comparisons to our modern response to crises. After, Maia revisits the game-changing 1987 technology CD-Video. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
